content: crochet bookmarks are perfect for a quick and easy project you can whip up some in no time at all there s nothing calm like relaxing at home with a good book like me if your hobbies are to read and crochet then you will definitely love having your own handmade crochet bookmarks handy at anytime today am sharing a simple and easy pattern for leaf bunch crochet bookmark this is a quick and easy to follow pattern made with simple stitches you can make one for yourself or make a bunch of them to give away as last minute gifts during holiday season or any other function or occasion materials used - 3 ply mercerized cotton yarn 3 mm crochet hook size - 9 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/vcwtxmcoisw
